resources.string: Welcome to MobLe, \nthe mobile learning app!
With this app you will start learning \nthe Portuguese language.
Notifications will be send throughout the day with new words.
This app consists of three parts:
1. An entry test \n2. Two days of training \n3. A final test.
Please go to settings \nto setup the notifications:
Go to the menu to start the entry test.
What is the correct translation of @string/some_test_word ?
You answered %1$d questions correctly from a total of %2$d questions!
